comments.raw_text:
We have .po files for the Join Mozilla program in SVN here: 

https://svn.mozilla.org/projects/l10n-misc/trunk/joinmozilla/locale/

In order to QA German content for Join Mozilla pages hosted on our servers, we'll need to checkout this directory into document_root/join/ on www-stage.mozilla.org and set up a cron task like the following:

> */15 * * * * svn up /path/to/join/locale && /path/to/join/locale/compile.sh /path/to/join/locale
